reviews.name: janedoe
reviews.review: One of the great cinematic thrill rides, and a spectacle of special effects. Spielberg blends groundbreaking (for the time) CGI with old-fashioned practical designs to create such a mesmerizing experience. This is the monster of all monster movies, and living proof that Hollywood blockbusters don't have to be stupid.

reviews.name: otherdoe
reviews.review: i work at a movie theater and had to listen to this play for 6 hours the other day to advertise for jurassic world 3 so now im mad at it
